benj 0.0.7
  • Reference

    Create annotation from GTF or GFF file

    createGeneAnnotationGFF.Rd

    Create annotation from GTF or GFF file

    createGeneAnnotationGFF(
  gff,
  OrgDb,
  dataSource,
  organism,
  annoStyle = "ENSEMBL"
)

    Arguments

    gff

    Path to GTF or GFF file

    OrgDb

    org.Hs.eg.db::org.Hs.eg.db or similar object

    dataSource

    String to create TxDb, e.g. "GENCODEv43"

    organism

    Organism string, e.g. Homo sapiens

    annoStyle

    How to join gene ids

    Value

    ArchR style createGeneAnnotation object

    Contents

    Developed by Benjamin James.

    Site built with pkgdown 2.0.7.
